testsuite.system-out: Entering UserName & Password and login to salesforce data is entered in username textbox data is entered in password textbox login button is clicked Login Successfull SalesForce User Menu button is clicked Salesforce User Menu Displayed My Setting button is clicked Settings Page Displayed Personal Menu button is clicked Login History button is clicked Login History Page Displayed Download Login History button is clicked File Download verified Display Layout button is clicked Customize tab button is clicked Salesforce Chatter selected in Custom App dropdown Reports selected in Custom App tab dropdown Add button is clicked Reports Tab Selected Email tab button is clicked My Email Settings button is clicked Email name is cleared Email Id is cleared Auto BCC button is clicked data is entered in Email Name textbox data is entered in Email id textbox Auto BCC Yes button is clicked Save button is clicked Save confirmation on email setting verified Calendar Reminder button is clicked Activity Reminder button is clicked Test reminder button is clicked Reminder Screen Displayed
